title: Agbe
author: Agbe
created_time: September 22, 2023, 02:15:02 PMLast edit: September 22, 2023, 06:18:19 PM by Agbe
content: As di topic implies, Nigeria like dis e don pas El Salvador for searching bitcoin in the internet. When I first see the things, e shock me and I was wondering if that is possible because El Salvador na di number one country wey do adopt bitcoin for di legal tender and Nigeria wey never accept bitcoin talk of adoption come dey pass El Salvador for the search for bitcoin in the internet. And one thing wey I like Nigerians be say dem dey serious to do anything wey good. And di day wen Nigeria go adopt bitcoin, lolz, no country in di world go near am for the uses of bitcoin. We go dey use am edge to edge. You go see say even SME go accept bitcoin. All di stores go accept am. El Salvador go dey play for where naija dey. Dat Nigeria Currency go rise up to ATH. Nigeria nai dey number one for all the countries wey dey search bitcoin for di internet. Dis one na plus to the Nigerian bitcoiners. Nigeria e no dey take last. At least Ghana sef dey push dey go and pass Canada.https://arbiterz.com/nigeria-has-most-bitcoin-searches-on-google-globally/

comments.author: proptradingpros
comments.body: Lol. Nigeria to the world  . Everything they go into they must dominate. Nice one as they have dominated the Cryptocurrency space.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Please, it would be better if you include a link.I have always seen Nigeria as first since I know about bitcoin.This was updated 2 months and some days ago on July 19, 2023: https://www.coingecko.com/research/publications/top-15-countries-most-curious-about-cryptocurrency. Quote from: https://www.coingecko.com/research/publications/top-15-countries-most-curious-about-cryptocurrencyWe examined Google Trends data of search terms frequently used by people interested in cryptocurrency. These terms were then combined to give each English-speaking country a ‘total search score’ to discover which countries have been the most interested in cryptocurrency since the market crash in April 2022.Although those are lists of English speaking countries but I am not expecting El Salvador to surpass Nigeria right from time with how a population of over 200 million people are adopting bitcoin.El Salvador can not compete in regard to this, they are only just 6.314 million while Nigeria population was estimated to be over 200 million. I am not expecting it that people will compare El Salvador with Nigeria.This was 4 years ago: https://bitcoinist.com/top-5-countries-where-google-searches-for-bitcoin-just-tripled/amp/After El Salvador adopt bitcoin as a legal tender, Nigeria was still above them: https://beincrypto.com/worldwide-bitcoin-adoption-countries-peak-google-search-interest-2022/

comments.author: Bitco55
comments.body: Yeah.. this is so cool and true too. According to a study by Blockchain.com, Nigeria was pointed out as the top country searching for Bitcoin on Google. Our country has been leading in interest in Bitcoin for over 90 days now, and it has become the largest Bitcoin market by trading volume in the continent.Normally, we sef no dey carry last.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: How them they carry do this their counting and analysis which type of data collection them they always use, I no they doubt say the country never reach top one, as them always they too list since I last check them, but as this matter reach here I just say make I use this opportunity carry ask how them they use do this kind calculation. Them they conduct survey to know how many people they hold coin for each country Abi them they use all diz blockchain analysis them carry track coin movement? Or them they work hand in hand with exchange them too to carry know who get this one and which person withdrawal bitcoin from their exchange enter another wallet and how the coin carry waka and who be the original owner from the beginning. If them also wan talk about altcoins too, I know say Nigeria no go still they below top 3 becuz many people way I sabi for the country way they inside this crypto thing, dem no they leave altcoins behind for their portfolio them they always add am to their wallet, even if eh they separate from bitcoin wallet. Nigeria they really they try sha, even as the country government no get open hand for blockchain the youth and people way sabi about am still no reliant for the matter, we still they push they accumulate Watin we fit.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on September 25, 2023, 10:26:12 PM. Nigeria they really they try sha, even as the country government no get open hand for blockchain the youth and people way sabi about am still no reliant for the matter, we still they push they accumulate Watin we fit.What do you expect from a country that has frustrated people and implemented a mindset of hard work and hustling among it's citizens. Omo this country hard but at still it's just like a disciplinary actions given to every Nigerian and that's how we have been so prosperous in almost everywhere and everything we do because we have the number ability of adaptation and anything that can actually yeild fruits then I think Nigeria will definitely be there.

If them also wan talk about altcoins too, I know say Nigeria no go still they below top 3 becuz many people way I sabi for the country way they inside this crypto thing, dem no they leave altcoins behind for their portfolio them they always add am to their wallet, even if eh they separate from bitcoin wallet. Nigeria they really they try sha, even as the country government no get open hand for blockchain the youth and people way sabi about am still no reliant for the matter, we still they push they accumulate Watin we fit. I believed  there are research experts that are doing this. And Forbes is one of them and others and in most time they got their information from google and other browsers directly. The data are easy to collect from google because google has each country information separately and each day each country visit to the server shows so if you want to get such information you just visit those browser support team and explain to them and collect the data. And there are other ways of gathering this information. But would not be done with manual counting but they always computing technology to find out the answers. There are some percentage they are using to measure the highest country. Frankly Speaking, I have not used altcoins before. And the only coins I have used and using is bitcoin.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: This news is serving as a means of raising awareness, particularly for individuals who are curious about the surge in interest surrounding Bitcoin among Nigerians. The timing and timeframe of this news are significant for those who are just now coming across it. The market is showing signs of a gradual uptrend, driven by strategic adjustments.
